html: .@xtina Boo, #Liberation should've been called #Lubrication. It penetrates you slowly but surely till you finally reach an eargasm with your last run in "Unless It's With You". The pleasure is real, girl . #Lubrication OUT NOW!pic.twitter.com/812eb2ji81
text: .@xtina Boo, #Liberation should've been called #Lubrication. It penetrates you slowly but surely till you finally reach an eargasm with your last run in "Unless It's With You". The pleasure is real, girl . #Lubrication OUT NOW!pic.twitter.com/812eb2ji81

html: I’ve had extreme commercial success in my career & I am grateful, but I am not a number chaser— I’m a truth seeker, and to me my art will always speak for itself outside of the noise.
text: I’ve had extreme commercial success in my career & I am grateful, but I am not a number chaser— I’m a truth seeker, and to me my art will always speak for itself outside of the noise.

html: I’m hearing and loving all your passion and desire for more content— I’m grateful & going to give back... I just want us to remember that at this point in my career I’m in competition with no one but myself.
text: I’m hearing and loving all your passion and desire for more content— I’m grateful & going to give back... I just want us to remember that at this point in my career I’m in competition with no one but myself.

html: This record has been about doing things on my own terms and not following a typical promotional suit. I want to do this on a more personal level for you, & I’m going to be giving you guys some performances of #Liberation material in my own way. #xtinaQApic.twitter.com/RFJizq7JPu
text: This record has been about doing things on my own terms and not following a typical promotional suit. I want to do this on a more personal level for you, & I’m going to be giving you guys some performances of #Liberation material in my own way. #xtinaQApic.twitter.com/RFJizq7JPu

html: I do have one specific routine you’ve probably heard a snippet of me doing at one point or another over the years. It’s out there... #xtinaQApic.twitter.com/cPH2GUjnHO
text: I do have one specific routine you’ve probably heard a snippet of me doing at one point or another over the years. It’s out there... #xtinaQApic.twitter.com/cPH2GUjnHO

text: You’ll definitely hear elements of past & present on this tour— don’t want to give away any secrets but... I’m busy putting all the magic together #xtinaQApic.twitter.com/MYNVrcc2Lr

html: Summer and I stick to our Disney songs together, BUT, my son Max actually has an incredible voice— he doesn’t showcase it a lot— but I caught him singing Maria the other day, and he was pitch perfect. He definitely has talent there if he ever wants to do anything w/ it #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/BICONlC/status/1025105670385950720 …
text: Summer and I stick to our Disney songs together, BUT, my son Max actually has an incredible voice— he doesn’t showcase it a lot— but I caught him singing Maria the other day, and he was pitch perfect. He definitely has talent there if he ever wants to do anything w/ it #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/BICONlC/status/1025105670385950720 …

html: Part of the reason behind #Liberation taking that long was a start and stop process with having my daughter & my schedule with The Voice, which is no longer happening, and I am very inspired with the new direction I’m going.
text: Part of the reason behind #Liberation taking that long was a start and stop process with having my daughter & my schedule with The Voice, which is no longer happening, and I am very inspired with the new direction I’m going.

html: Quite a few actually— I had recorded a lot more & you may see them pop up on tour, on my socials, or even on a follow-up album... WHICH NO I’M NOT GOING TO TAKE ANOTHER 6 YEARS TO RECORD #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/KalMamkegh/status/1025099582177456128 …
text: Quite a few actually— I had recorded a lot more & you may see them pop up on tour, on my socials, or even on a follow-up album... WHICH NO I’M NOT GOING TO TAKE ANOTHER 6 YEARS TO RECORD #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/KalMamkegh/status/1025099582177456128 …

html: I do love horror...I’m gonna go classic on this one— during Halloween time I love to go back & watch the original “Halloween”s (with Michael Myers.) The score is epic, you could put a beat under it & it could live as it’s own track today #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/edgargein/status/1025099191998205959 …
text: I do love horror...I’m gonna go classic on this one— during Halloween time I love to go back & watch the original “Halloween”s (with Michael Myers.) html: Being able to be a kid again myself, and finding pleasure in small smiles and cozy moments of everyday life. #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/Too8oo/status/1025110123818168325 …
text: Being able to be a kid again myself, and finding pleasure in small smiles and cozy moments of everyday life. #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/Too8oo/status/1025110123818168325 …

html: I’ve said yes to much in my career that I’ve felt uncomfortable with, and this time around I promised myself that it was about getting back to my truth moreso than anything else.
text: I’ve said yes to much in my career that I’ve felt uncomfortable with, and this time around I promised myself that it was about getting back to my truth moreso than anything else.

html: It’s been really rewarding to be able to focus on getting back to my love of the music & not the superficial grind of the machine or cheesy commercial demands that are put on us as artists. #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/lorena96ra/status/1025110562143973376 …
text: It’s been really rewarding to be able to focus on getting back to my love of the music & not the superficial grind of the machine or cheesy commercial demands that are put on us as artists. #xtinaQAhttps://twitter.com/lorena96ra/status/1025110562143973376 …

html: I enjoy experimenting with textures according to my moods, whether it be soft tones to belts and growls...
text: I enjoy experimenting with textures according to my moods, whether it be soft tones to belts and growls...

html: #LIBERATION as been a great inspiration for me. @xtina Thanks for your voice, your sensitivity, your deep soul and your words! I’ll never stop thanking you ‘cause you encouraged me to find myself. In this way I discovered my little talent. This is for you! Your fighter pic.twitter.com/RVEDxVmt7g
text:
#LIBERATION as been a great inspiration for me. @xtina Thanks for your voice, your sensitivity, your deep soul and your words! I’ll never stop thanking you ‘cause you encouraged me to find myself. In this way I discovered my little talent. 
This is for you! 
Your fighter pic.twitter.com/RVEDxVmt7g
